Project 2

Instructions

  • Press X to translate the mesh in the positive X direction.
  • Press C to translate the mesh in the negative X direction.
  • Press Y to translate the mesh in the positive Y direction.
  • Press U to translate the mesh in the negative Y direction.
  • Press Z to translate the mesh in the positive Z direction.
  • Press A to translate the mesh in the negative Z direction.
  • Press R to rotate the mesh around the X direction in its current position.
  • Press B to toggle mesh pulsing.
